items.title: Y CHROMOSOME MICRODELETION (YCM)
items.description:
• Micro deletion (YCM) It is a family of genetic disorders caused by missing genes in the Y chromosome.
  • Mostly asymptomatic Present in a significant number of men with severe oligospermia or azoospermia

sections.title: Diagnosis
sections.description: • Currently diagnosed by karyotyping with specific testing for micro deletions on the Y chromosome.
